text: Python: How to loop through blocks of lines
How to go through blocks of lines separated by an empty line?
The file looks like the following:

code:
ID: 1
Name: X
FamilyN: Y
Age: 20

ID: 2
Name: H
FamilyN: F
Age: 23

ID: 3
Name: S
FamilyN: Y
Age: 13

ID: 4
Name: M
FamilyN: Z
Age: 25

text: I want to loop through the blocks and grab the fields Name, Family name and Age in a list of 3 columns:

code:
Y X 20
F H 23
Y S 13
Z M 25
